Arquitetura 1 - Tarde
Guia 02

01)
a) 0,10111(2) = 0,71875(10)
b) 0,01010(2) = 0,3125(10)
c) 0,01011(2) = 0,343750(10)
d) 1,01001(2) = 1,28125(10)
e) 11,11010(2) = 3,8125(10)

02)
a) 0,12500(10) = 0,001(2)
b) 0,87500(10) = 0,111(2)
c) 1,25000(10) = 1,01(2)
d) 3,75000(10) = 11,11(2)
e) 14,03125(10) = 1110,00001(2)

03)
a) 0,101100(2) = 0,23(4)
b) 0,101101(2) = 0,55(8)
c) 0,101010(2) = 0,A8(16)
d) 1,111110(2) = 1,76(8)
e) 1011,111(2) - B,E(16)

04)
a) 0,132(4) = 0,011110(2)
b) 0,312(4) = 0,D8(16)
c) 0,357(8) = 0,011101111(2)
d) 4,350(8) = 10,131(4)
e) C,670(16) = 30,121300(4)

05)
a) 101,11(2) + 11,101(2) = 1001,011(2)
b) 1011,101(2) -10,01(2) = 1001,011(2)
c) 100,101(2) * 11,01(2) = 1111,00001(2)
d) 10101,111(2) / 10,11(2) = 111,1111...(2)
e) 1110101(2) % 1001(2) = 0(2)
